line.text: %PLAYER%: Angel, you were right. There's a group of soldiers attacking an atmospheric processor... and they just destroyed it!
line.textb: %PLAYER%: Looks like you were right, Angel. Soldiers are here. They just destroyed an atmospheric processor.

line.text: %Angel%: You'll have to quickly find the other two processors in that area. If those troops bring them down, this entire section of the Savage Land is going to be an arctic wasteland in a matter of seconds.
line.textb: %Angel%: If those troops succeed in destroying the other processors, this section of the Savage Land is gonna be buried under snow and ice in a matter of seconds. That means we'll never find out what Apocalypse wants here and we'll never save Quicksilver.

line.text: %PLAYER%: You heard Angel. Let's get moving and find those processors.
line.textb: %PLAYER%: Enough of the dramatics, Angel. I know the only reason you want us to stop those soldiers is to save everyone in the Savage Land from freezing to death. But don't worry, we'll take care of it.
